column4: i need help Azureus is quitting itself as soon as I launch it, and I tried reinstalling it through automatix but Automatix won't launch either because it says Apt-get is running and I don't know how to stop it from running...
have you tried deluge instead of azureus?
i want to use azureus it used to work i dont see why it wouldn't work anymore
that's probably why it's broken (automatix)
how do i close apt-get
uh, don't run it?
i dont even know why it's still running im not checking for updates
synaptic is closed too?
i dont have the update icon and im not updating i have no idea why it's supposedly running
yes synaptic is closed everything is closed but XIRC
how do i make sure apt-get is closed
it doesn't stay open, you can reboot, then once you've rebooted, you can delete the lock file
any way I could kill it without rebooting
it's probably not running, but you can't delete the lock file without rebooting to be sure
thank you it worked
however Azureus tries to update and it fails because it doesn't have write permission, do you know how I could fix?
that's normal I would think
don't worry about it
it prompts me to update everytime i launch it, it bugs me lol
can't turn it off?
i do not know how
id like to update if possible
you shouldn't install software outside of APT
